description: Alterations and conversion of 187-211 St.John Street, including new mansard roof to 193, new four storey infill block at north end (next to 213 St.John Street), new three storey blocks to Haywards Place and Woodbridge Street (retaining listed front boundary wall) and new 3-4 storey internal block in centre of site, to provide 85 dwellings with car park in basement for 85 spaces, accessed via ramp from the north end of St.John Street. Applicant's Plan Nos.:  101A,102B,103B,104A,105B-108B,109C
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
